name: WALK IN THE RAIN
description:
SUMMARY

Walk In The Rain is a simple experimental walking simulation what hopefully helps you to reduce stress and anxiety.  Let you imagination to flow and pop some floating orbs. 

CONTROLS

W/A/S/D: Move
LEFT MOUSE: Pop orb, ESC BUTTON: Quit game.

FEATURES

  • 3D procedurally generated enviroment
  • Relaxing rain soundscape to calm your senses
  • Simple gameplay with no high scores ,missions or targets.

CREDITS @gamesbyjens
